About.title: About the Artist
About.intro: L'Eau et l'Encre is a creative studio where watercolor meets ink, creating dreamlike illustrations inspired by nature and imagination.
About.technique: Each piece is carefully crafted using traditional techniques, combining the fluidity of watercolor with the precision of ink.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.intro: For commissions, collaborations, or inquiries, feel free to reach out.
